snippet.title: FUR Squadron - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
FUR Squadron is an arcade space shooter on rails, which follows the adventure of a team of elite pilots during what seems at first a routine training in virtual reality.

-------

GET IT NOW:

Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/fur-squadron-switch/
STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2269980/FUR_Squadron/
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.RaptorClaw.FURSquadron
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/fur-squadron/id6444919851

-------
